channel.title: Зануда on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Зануда on Rusland 1

item.title: Зануда 3x
item.description: Папиросы (2010): Cigarettes A папироса is a cigarette. Папиросы is the plural form (also the title of the album) and, according to the lyrics, it’s the solution to all вопросы (questions). The lyrics video shows some unique tobacco products; the clip itself is smoke-free.

item.title: Centr 3x
item.description: Padarok Also from there: ‘Initially, they wrote an unofficial album Подарок (Podarok / Gift), but only 13 copies of it were made and given to their close friends for the New Year.’ Качели (katsjeli) means swing, and that’s also the title of their first album (released in 2007, more on Википедия = Wikipedia in Russian).
